title: Bar Stool
shortDescription: Long enough for tall and short people
longDescription: Dark grey bar stool made from hard wooed exotic trees from The Congo

title: Moderna 2-Seater Couch
longDescription: achieves that perfect mix of grounded modernism and contemporary comfort. This sofa reflects the best of mid-century inspired design with a solid eucalyptus frame, wooden legs, and ample cushioning.
